eu.tivian.musico.net

Class Exchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.musico.net.Service
      • eu.tivian.musico.net.Exchange

  • public class Exchange
extends Service
    Provides the information about current or pas exchange rates.
    See Also:
    Exchange rates API reference

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Exchange.InstanceHolder
      Helper class to ensure thread-safe singleton creation.
      static class  Exchange.Rates
      A class representation of the exchange rates report.

    • Field Summary

      The base URL for the exchange API.

      • get

        public static Exchange get()
        Returns the singleton.

        the singleton instance.

      • getRates

        public void getRates(Consumer<Exchange.Rates> action)
        Gets the exchange rates for today, using the default base currency (denoted by BASE_CURRENCY.
        Parameters:
        action - functor determining what should happen with received data.

      • getRates

        public void getRates(String base,
                     Consumer<Exchange.Rates> action)
        Gets the exchange rates for today, based on provided base currency.
        Parameters:
        base - the base currency, for which the exchange rate will be equal to 1.
        action - functor determining what should happen with received data.

      • getRates

        public void getRates(String base,
                     Date date,
                     Consumer<Exchange.Rates> action)
        Gets the exchange rates for specified date using provided base currency.
        Parameters:
        base - the base currency, for which the exchange rate will be equal to 1.
        date - the date of desired exchange rates list.
        action - functor determining what should happen with received data.

      • parseRates

        private Exchange.Rates parseRates(JsonReader reader)
        Parses the data from server into the list of exchange rates.
        Parameters:
        reader - input JSON stream.
        Returns:
        the exchange rates list.

      • getDate

        private String getDate(Date date)
        Converts the Date object into string.
        Parameters:
        date - date to parse.
        Returns:
        string in format "yyyy-MM-dd".

      • toDate

        private Date toDate(String str)
        Parses string into the Date object.
        Parameters:
        str - text to parse.
        Returns:
        parsed date or null if format of string was invalid.

      • connect

        protected InputStream connect(String req)
        Connects to the Exchange rates website. None authorization is required.
        Specified by:
        connect in class Service
        Parameters:
        req - the URL to connect to.
        Returns:
        input stream.
